name: lowly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
low in position and importance, or not respected: He took a lowly job in an insurance firm. His first job in the hotel was as a lowly bellboy.

Add to word list
not having importance or rank: In chess it is possible for the lowly pawn to become the most powerful piece on the board.
